text:
Thank you so much for helping us
out with our big photo shoot! I'm
sending you a gift to express our
gratitude. My darling Cy-Guy made
it, so take good care of it, OK?

I'm sending you the thank-you gift
I forgot to give you last time. You

Thank you for the fabulous party!
Please take this small token of our
appreciation. My darling and I
wanted to share our happiness
with you.
